caption.title: Spatiotemporal diffusion of HIV-1 subtypes A1, C and D across Central and East Africa.
caption.p: Internal nodes of maximum clade credibility and 95% HPD regions based on 1,000 trees subsampled from the posterior distribution of each continuous phylogeographic analysis. MCC tree internal nodes are coloured according to their time of occurrence, and 95% HPD regions were computed for successive time layers and then superimposed using the same colour scale reflecting time. Crosses indicate the position of the sampling locations.
Click here for additional data file.
